title: PHPnewKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPnewKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Create an object and output the value of one of its properties:
<?php
class MyClass {
public $name = "John";
}
$obj = new 
  MyClass();
echo "The name is " . $obj->name;
?>

Definition and Usage
The
new
keyword is used to create an object from a class.
Related Pages
Learn more about classes and objects in our
PHP OOP - Classes and Objects Tutorial
.

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPnewKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPnewKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPnewKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
